name: A Bugs Life 001
description:
"A Bug's Life", a collection by Pure Mattness. Insects and other small creatures showing off for the camera. Photos taken using an Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark II and a DIY macro lens. 
-----
If, as owner of this NFT, you would like a quote to receive a signed print of this piece, please contact PureMattness (twitter:purestmattness, instagram:puremattness, facebook:puremattness). Include the address to which you would like the print delivered. This service is available solely at the discretion of the artist, and is limited to 1 print per person. Only as many prints as there are editions of the NFT will ever be made. Print specifications (size, ink, print-stock, etc) are negotiable.



-----



An owner of this NFT is granted the right to limited personal non-commercial use of the artwork associated with it, as well as the right to sell or transfer ownership of the NFT token (OBJKT).
